ja458:12.1: ca vaṇṇo ca → āyuñca vaṇṇañca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja458:13.3: Hāyateva tava → hāyate vata te (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | hāyateva tato (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja458:15.4: Kathaṃ nu devāna → kathaṃ na devānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja458:20.2: saṅgarattā idhāgato → saṅgaratthā idhāgato (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | saṅkaratthāyidhāgato (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja458:23.3: jahati → jahāti (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | jahātī (?)
ja458:24.2: Bhariyā yāpi dhanena hoti kītā → bhariyā sāmiko sadhanena hoti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | bhariyāpi dhanena honti atittā (mr)
ja458:25.1: parabhojananti ñatvā → kāyo parabhojananti viditvā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | kāyo ca parabhojanaṃ viditvā (mr)
ja458:25.2: sugatiñca duggatiñca → sugatī ca duggatī ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | suggatiṃ duggatiñca (mr)
